# Test

This is a test of a just amazing great plot, created in R. Awesome! 
```{r chunk-label, echo=TRUE, fig.cap='test'}
a<-c(1:100)
b<-a^2
plot(b~a)
```

## Sub-chapter 1

You can also embed plots without the R code, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Nice, right?!
